sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFLogger</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class for logging localization framework details. Customers are not expected to override these core functions.</description>
        <name>LFLogger</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFLogger = Class.create();
LFLogger.prototype = {
    prefix: "Localization Framework",

    initialize: function(source) {
        this.source = source;
    },

    logError: function(error, source) {
        gs.error("{0}: Error occurred in {1}. {2}", this.prefix, source || this.source, error);
    },

    logWarning: function(warn, source) {
        gs.warn("{0}: Warn message from {1}. {2}", this.prefix, source || this.source, warn);
    },

    logInfo: function(info, source) {
        gs.info("{0}: Info message from {1}. {2}", this.prefix, source || this.source, info);
    },

    logDebug: function(debug, source) {
        gs.debug("{0}: Debug message from {1}. {2}", this.prefix, source || this.source, debug);
    },

    type: 'LFLogger'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-05 19:36:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>05a08653c791201020dab6c427c260a1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LFLogger</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">a4dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d4312</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_05a08653c791201020dab6c427c260a1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-04-28 05:13:12</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
